txt.en: Before delving deeper into Atrad-zarakh, you should talk to Mekhnet.
'Hrm... I don't hear or see movement downstairs. Up we go, then.'
You have found Thraunákh, though Mekhnet wishes to speak with you before facing him.
'These poor creatures will listen to none but their masters now.'
'Curse these goblin-sappers... I'll be satisfied once we can stop them for good.'

'Look at us; we're in Atrad-zarakh and the Orcs outside are none the wiser! You made short work of those sentries earlier.

'Thraunákh's creations have caused no small amount of woe for us. With him out of the way, we stand a chance to claim Atrad-zarakh for good.

'Of course, we can't claim the watch-tower tonight with just the two of us, but let's find Thraunákh and leave our mark. Shall we?'
With Atrad-zarakh finally breached, it is up to you and Mekhnet to stop Thraunákh and his sapper-bombs.
'We knew time would not be kind to these ruins, but...'

'That must be him. He seems like a nervous worm, but putting together these sapper-bombs requires careful planning and thought. If only that intelligence was not used for such a destructive purpose.\n\n'Well, enough talk. Let's finish what we set out to do, yes?'
'Eugh... what have those cursed Orcs done to this place?'

'Good riddance. I can never get back the months I spent recovering, but at least this will prevent more of our comrades from experiencing the same pain.\n\n'Now, let's head back. I'm sure Lúka is worried sick. Heh, sometimes I think she'll never relax.'
You should defend Mekhnet as you both face Thraunákh.
'All we can offer them is a swift end.'
'Even so, I'm glad to be doing something again.'
'Truth be told, I did not miss the fighting.'
